content:
This PR adds two results:

  • Pair of integral elements is an integral element of the product algebra (IsIntegral.pair)
  • Product of integral algebras is an integral algebra (instance, Algebra.IsIntegral.prod).

There is already IsIntegral.prod for finite product of elements but maybe it could be renamed to IsIntegral.mul' or Isintegral.mul_fin and then IsIntegral.pair could be IsIntegral.prod if that makes sense.
I'm not sure if it makes sense to name the instance?

#21191

I think the current .prod should stay as it is, and .pair is good for the new lemma.
That matches conventions in other places of the library
Michał Staromiejski has marked this topic as resolved.
